front.title: IEEE Seismic Guide for Power Transformers and Reactors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: performance requirements of transformers and reactors during and following a design earthquake.
front.abstract: IEEE C57.114-1990, IEEE Seismic Guide for Power Transformers and Reactors, specifiesrecommendations for the design and installation of power transformers and reactors to withstandthe effects of earthquakes.
